评论概述: Nice design but shipped wrong item
评论详情: Firstly, the design of the shirt was nice and the wife is pleased with it. The only issue I have is that on the ordering page you have multiple options available. We selected two different designs but when the items came they were both the same so my wife now has two of the same shirts so it was a waste of money. If we would have got what we had ordered than this would probably be a 5 star review but when you can't fulfil your orders correctly then I must remove stars. All-in-all, good fabric and design but bad order fulfillment.

I recently purchased two of these tunics in different colors.  They were even prettier than pictured!!  Without any tags for washing instructions - I washed in cold water, dried for about 5 minutes in the dryer, then removed from dryer and line dried overnight. They turned out perfect!!  No shrinking or fading.I am confined to a wheelchair, so I ordered two sizes larger than I would normally wear.  The extra size gives me the extra roominess I need to be comfortable.  I love the softness of the fabric, also.  I definitely would buy again!!  👍👍
